issue.title: Allow GMTK to use NAN for observations

content.raw: I think the filling in with 0's is done to facilitate the downsample_add function in observations.py, ie [3 3 NaN NaN NaN], with res 5 should be downsampled to [3]. So Segway fills in the NaN's with 0's, sums it ([3 3 0 0 0]) and then divides by the number of non-missing datapoints (2) and also weights it by this number. So it becomes [6]/2 = [3] with weight 2. To incorporate this change we'd have to change the downsample_add function too, I think.
